prop.name: inventoryLevel
prop.desc: The current approximate inventory level for the item or items.

Product.name: manufacturer
Product.desc: The manufacturer of the product.

Product.name: sku
Product.desc: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), i.e. a merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or the product to which the offer refers.

Product.name: audience
Product.desc: An intended audience, i.e. a group for whom something was created.

Product.name: mpn
Product.desc: The Manufacturer Part Number (MPN) of the product, or the product to which the offer refers.

Product.name: height
Product.desc: The height of the item.

Product.name: gtin8
Product.desc: The GTIN-8 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. This code is also known as EAN/UCC-8 or 8-digit EAN. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

Product.name: reviews
Product.desc: Review of the item.

Product.name: aggregateRating
Product.desc: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

Product.name: isConsumableFor
Product.desc: A pointer to another product (or multiple products) for which this product is a consumable.

Product.name: offers
Product.desc: An offer to provide this item—for example, an offer to sell a product, rent the DVD of a movie, perform a service, or give away tickets to an event.

Product.name: award
Product.desc: An award won by or for this item.

Product.name: category
Product.desc: A category for the item. Greater signs or slashes can be used to informally indicate a category hierarchy.

Product.name: width
Product.desc: The width of the item.

Product.name: awards
Product.desc: Awards won by or for this item.

Product.name: additionalProperty
Product.desc:
A property-value pair representing an additional characteristics of the entitity, e.g. a product feature or another characteristic for which there is no matching property in schema.org.

Note: Publishers should be aware that applications designed to use specific schema.org properties (e.g. http://schema.org/width, http://schema.org/color, http://schema.org/gtin13, ...) will typically expect such data to be provided using those properties, rather than using the generic property/value mechanism.

Product.name: isAccessoryOrSparePartFor
Product.desc: A pointer to another product (or multiple products) for which this product is an accessory or spare part.

Product.name: logo
Product.desc: An associated logo.

Product.name: gtin14
Product.desc: The GTIN-14 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

Product.name: gtin13
Product.desc: The GTIN-13 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. This is equivalent to 13-digit ISBN codes and EAN UCC-13. Former 12-digit UPC codes can be converted into a GTIN-13 code by simply adding a preceeding zero. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

Product.name: gtin12
Product.desc: The GTIN-12 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. The GTIN-12 is the 12-digit GS1 Identification Key composed of a U.P.C. Company Prefix, Item Reference, and Check Digit used to identify trade items. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

Product.name: material
Product.desc: A material that something is made from, e.g. leather, wool, cotton, paper.

Product.name: weight
Product.desc: The weight of the product or person.

Product.name: depth
Product.desc: The depth of the item.

Product.name: isSimilarTo
Product.desc: A pointer to another, functionally similar product (or multiple products).

Product.name: model
Product.desc: The model of the product. Use with the URL of a ProductModel or a textual representation of the model identifier. The URL of the ProductModel can be from an external source. It is recommended to additionally provide strong product identifiers via the gtin8/gtin13/gtin14 and mpn properties.

Product.name: color
Product.desc: The color of the product.

Product.name: isRelatedTo
Product.desc: A pointer to another, somehow related product (or multiple products).

Product.name: productID
Product.desc: The product identifier, such as ISBN. For example: meta itemprop="productID" content="isbn:123-456-789".

Product.name: review
Product.desc: A review of the item.

Product.name: purchaseDate
Product.desc: The date the item e.g. vehicle was purchased by the current owner.

Product.name: itemCondition
Product.desc: A predefined value from OfferItemCondition or a textual description of the condition of the product or service, or the products or services included in the offer.

Product.name: productionDate
Product.desc: The date of production of the item, e.g. vehicle.

Product.name: brand
Product.desc: The brand(s) associated with a product or service, or the brand(s) maintained by an organization or business person.

Product.name: releaseDate
Product.desc: The release date of a product or product model. This can be used to distinguish the exact variant of a product.
